Reviews.Title: A power phone with the cheapest price!
Reviews.Author: pigyellow
Reviews.Content: Sensitive and large touch screen, fast processor, android 4.0. Light, slim and beautiful design! Better than iphone 4 with just haft price! What else do you expect for a cell phone? This is the smartest choice in the world!

Reviews.Title: Mucho Barato
Reviews.Author: Martin
Reviews.Content: Great product, better screen than iphone 4 (compared). Fast and wide screen. It could be better but not for the price.

Reviews.Title: Purchase awful, awful attention
Reviews.Author: Sandy Medrano
Reviews.Content: Amazon did not publish my previous review because it allegedly spoke ill of the seller, so talk about the product, although there is a clear position towards the seller:I ordered the P700 (despite being clear with my purchase), I got the P705, a cheap Chinese version, which is VERY SLOW for data exchange in my country. In fact, for my phone line never served. I wanted to return, but will not give further details. The Seller was another drama ....I recommend, especially if they are outside the U.S. and want a good sized product that offers fast, do not buy this phone!

Reviews.Title: slow data connection
Reviews.Author: Ta W. Shu
Reviews.Content: Slow data connection (euro gsm standard); otherwise a great phone. Very thin and nice large screen and decent processing speed. Again would be a great phone if the phone is US GSM/CDMA compatible.

ProductInfo.Name: LG Optimus L7 P700 Unlocked Android Phone
